course_info.title: Investment, Portfolio Construction and Trading Analytics

_metadata.course_description: This is an applied research course that explores how to apply fundamental machine learning models for financial prediction, algorithmic trading, model calibration, and portfolio optimization.
learning_outcomes: Apply statistical models and analytical methods to the finance domain.
Recognize the value and limits of statistical learning algorithms to solve financial problems.
Develop analytical models for financial forecasting, portfolio optimization, and trading.
prerequisites: A Machine learning course or similar training.
